EXTRACTED VALUE: A lazy effort. Xbox Live play is poorly implemented and those seeking online racing are better off trying the PC version.
It’s a mix of exciting and overwhelming as you try to maintain what feels like 50 pots boiling over at different times.
A decent sequel to the first game that is ultimately mired by an intolerably imbalanced career mode.
Even faulted, the gameplay grows on you, but you probably won’t have the patience or desire to let it get to that point.
LSW2 is a quality title, but it suffers the same problem as the films it parodies.
It isn't a huge upgrade but if you've been holding off for the Xbox 360 version then Battlefield 2: Modern Combat is still a very enjoyable game.
